name: Gridlocked (CaveBoy36)
description:
You can move freely, but wait... only once?!? Gridlock is a 2D puzzle game that disables your control after you release the button. This means you'll actually have to think twice about your next move.

Gridlock was made in 48 hours for my first game jam, GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme for the jam was "only once".
